The screaming banshee is a superior variant of the banshee. It has a 1/200 chance of spawning while on a Slayer task of banshees after purchasing the unlock Bigger and Badder for 150 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master.

Contents

  • 1 Drops
    • 1.1 Weapons and armour
    • 1.2 Runes
    • 1.3 Herbs
    • 1.4 Coins
    • 1.5 Other
    • 1.6 Gem drop table
    • 1.7 Tertiary
    • 1.8 Superior Slayer tertiary
  • 2 Changes

Drops[edit | edit source]

In addition to 100% drops and tertiary drops, superior slayer monsters will always roll 3 additional items, of which only 1 roll may be from the superior unique table. The other rolls are performed on the regular counterpart's table; their displayed drop chances represent a single roll.

Drop rates estimated based on 64,500 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Screaming banshee kill is worth 38,690.56.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
23 February 2017
(update | poll)

The screaming banshee was given a graphical update to be more distinguishable from their regular variants.
